descriptions: A single deployable unit containing all application code, suitable for smaller teams and simpler deployment pipelines, but may become difficult to scale and maintain as the codebase grows larger over time

Distributed system of independently deployable services communicating via APIs, enabling team autonomy and independent scaling, but introducing complexity in service discovery, distributed transactions, and observability
Event-driven functions that scale automatically and charge per execution, ideal for sporadic workloads but potentially expensive at scale and challenging for long-running processes
